archimate:Requirement.name: 4.57.3 Cloud service data protection control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Data processed by cloud services should be protected, which includes: * managing critical and sensitive data by using data location services, performing data backups regularly and protecting data in line with its classification * encrypting sensitive data by using the CSP default encryption solution, con-figuring customer-managed key encryption or implementing customer-supplied key encryption * employing a data leakage prevention (DLP) solution by extending an on-premises DLP programme to cloud services, configuring DLP functionality in cloud services and/or using the DLP functionality of a cloud access security broker (CASB).
